progressWeights.description: Good market validation with user research and beta commitments but no revenue validation
progressWeights.rationale: Initial user research completed, 20 freelancers committed to beta testing, and clickable prototype developed, but no paying customers or revenue validation yet
keyAchievements: Initial user research completed
20 freelancers committed to beta test MVP
Clickable prototype developed
Strong network within freelance communities
Core platform development underway
mainGaps: No revenue validation or paying customers
No customer feedback from actual usage
Limited scale of beta testing (20 freelancers)

progressWeights.description: Clear problem definition and solution approach with strong value proposition
progressWeights.rationale: Well-defined problem (freelancer workflow fragmentation), clear solution (all-in-one platform with AI assistance), and strong value proposition (tailored for freelancers, unified workflow)
keyAchievements: Clear problem statement: freelancer workflow fragmentation
Well-defined solution: all-in-one platform with AI assistance
Strong value proposition: tailored for freelancers, unified workflow
Clear target customers: independent freelancers and small creative agencies
Long-term vision: operating system for freelance economy
mainGaps: Product scope boundaries need refinement for MVP

progressWeights.description: Excellent co-founder team with complementary freelance and technical expertise
progressWeights.rationale: Strong combination of CEO (7+ years freelance experience), CTO (SaaS engineer with payment systems expertise), and Head of Product (marketplace community growth experience), with lived freelance experience
keyAchievements: CEO: 7+ years successful freelance business experience
CTO: Ex-engineer from leading SaaS company with payment systems expertise
Head of Product: Marketplace community growth experience
Lived experience as freelancers solving personal problems
Strong network within freelance communities
mainGaps: Feature prioritization for MVP launch needed

progressWeights.description: Clear revenue model with multiple streams but needs validation
progressWeights.rationale: Well-defined tiered subscription model and transaction fees on payment processing, with expansion potential to marketplace model, but no revenue validation yet
keyAchievements: Clear tiered subscription model
Transaction fees on payment processing
Scalable revenue streams
Expansion potential to marketplace model
Recurring subscription income
mainGaps: No revenue validation with paying customers
No unit economics defined (CAC, LTV, margins)

progressWeights.description: Strong market opportunity with growing freelance economy
progressWeights.rationale: Growing freelance economy, increasing need for streamlined workflow tools, and demand for unified platforms, but no market size data or customer segment analysis provided
keyAchievements: Growing freelance economy trend
Increasing need for streamlined workflow tools
Demand for unified platforms vs multiple disconnected tools
Strong network within freelance communities
Long-term vision for freelance economy operating system
mainGaps: No market size data (TAM, SAM unknown)

progressWeights.description: Good competitive advantages through freelancer focus and AI assistance
progressWeights.rationale: Clear differentiation through freelancer-specific features, AI assistance, and unified platform approach, but limited competitive analysis provided
keyAchievements: Tailored specifically for freelancers (vs generic business tools)
AI-assisted contract and proposal drafting
Unified platform eliminating tool fragmentation
Lived experience as freelancers solving personal problems
Strong network within freelance communities

tasks.description: Prioritize features for MVP launch based on user research
Develop core platform features for MVP
tasks.outcome: Functional MVP ready for beta testing

successCriteria: Feature prioritization completed based on user research
Core platform features developed for MVP
MVP ready for beta testing with 20 freelancers
riskMitigation: Focus on core value proposition features first
Build MVP with minimal viable features
Iterate quickly based on beta feedback

tasks.description: Launch beta testing with 20 committed freelancers
Validate pricing model and willingness to pay
tasks.outcome: Validated pricing strategy and customer willingness to pay

successCriteria: Pricing model validated with beta users
riskMitigation: Offer free beta access to reduce user risk
Monitor user engagement and satisfaction closely

estimatedTimeToCompletion: 8-12 months to sustainable revenue and product-market fit
criticalPath: Prioritize features for MVP launch based on user research
Develop core platform features for MVP
Convert beta users to paying customers
Validate unit economics and scale customer acquisition
